articles.description: Sara Parris says she noticed her son wasn't speaking correctly
articles.content:
KANSAS CITY, Mo. —Doctors in central Missouri say a 3-year-old experienced a stroke after testing positive for COVID-19.
The boy's mom said she noticed something wasn't right with her child and rush… [+2133 chars]
